CustomField.formula:
IF(
OR( AND( CONTAINS( SBQQ__Quote__r.Services_Project_Type__c ,"Change Request"), OR( ISPICKVAL( SBQQ__Quote__r.Services_Terms__c,"T&M"), ISPICKVAL( SBQQ__Quote__r.Services_Terms__c,"FF"), ISPICKVAL( SBQQ__Quote__r.Services_Terms__c,"Milestone") )), ISPICKVAL(SBQQ__Quote__r.Services_Only_Type__c ,'FF Change Order'), ISPICKVAL(SBQQ__Quote__r.Services_Only_Type__c ,'T&M Change Order') ),
TEXT(YEAR(SBQQ__Quote__r.SBQQ__ExpirationDate__c))& IF(MONTH(SBQQ__Quote__r.SBQQ__ExpirationDate__c) <10,"0"&TEXT(MONTH(SBQQ__Quote__r.SBQQ__ExpirationDate__c)),TEXT(MONTH(SBQQ__Quote__r.SBQQ__ExpirationDate__c)))& TEXT(DAY(SBQQ__Quote__r.SBQQ__ExpirationDate__c))&
"_Bundle#"& SBQQ__Quote__r.OSA_Number__c & '_CR#X for #'&
SBQQ__Quote__r.OSA_Number__c &
IF(ISPICKVAL(SBQQ__Quote__r.Line_of_Business__c,"Intapp"),"_Intapp_",IF(ISPICKVAL(SBQQ__Quote__r.Line_of_Business__c,"DealCloud"),"_DealCloud_",""))&
SUBSTITUTE(SBQQ__Quote__r.SBQQ__Account__r.Account_Short_Name__c," ","")
& IF(ISPICKVAL(SBQQ__Quote__r.Version__c,"1"),"","_v"&TEXT( SBQQ__Version__c ))
,
TEXT(YEAR(SBQQ__Quote__r.SBQQ__ExpirationDate__c))& IF(MONTH(SBQQ__Quote__r.SBQQ__ExpirationDate__c) <10,"0"&TEXT(MONTH(SBQQ__Quote__r.SBQQ__ExpirationDate__c)),TEXT(MONTH(SBQQ__Quote__r.SBQQ__ExpirationDate__c)))& TEXT(DAY(SBQQ__Quote__r.SBQQ__ExpirationDate__c))& "_Bundle#"& SBQQ__Quote__r.OSA_Number__c & IF(ISPICKVAL(SBQQ__Quote__r.Line_of_Business__c,"Intapp"),"_Intapp_",IF(ISPICKVAL(SBQQ__Quote__r.Line_of_Business__c,"DealCloud"),"_DealCloud_",""))& SUBSTITUTE(SBQQ__Quote__r.SBQQ__Account__r.Account_Short_Name__c," ","") & "_v" & TEXT( SBQQ__Version__c )
)
CustomField.label: CustomName
